label.name: Proceed to Unit 1 after you complete the self-asse...
label.intro:
Proceed to Unit 1 after you complete the self-assessment activity. Here is what you will learn in Unit 1:
  • You will be introduced to the eleven research-based strategies for motivating adult learners to persist
  • You will explore some common motivation and persistence challenges in working with adult learners and approaches that can work
